mapper.select: SELECT mi.mv_name mv_name, mi.mv_gradeimg FROM movie_info mi JOIN movie_audience ma ON mi.mv_code = ma.mv_code WHERE au_status="개봉"

SELECT DISTINCT th_area, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(th_city)) FROM theater_info WHERE th_area = '서울') AS seoul, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(th_city)) FROM theater_info WHERE th_area = '경기/인천') AS incheon, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(th_city)) FROM theater_info WHERE th_area = '강원') AS gangwon, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(th_city)) FROM theater_info WHERE th_area = '대전/충청') AS daejeon, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(th_city)) FROM theater_info WHERE th_area = '부산/대구/경상') AS busan, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(th_city)) FROM theater_info WHERE th_area = '광주/전라') AS gwangju FROM theater_info

SELECT DISTINCT ti.th_seatcnt, t.mv_idx, t.ms_idx, TIME_FORMAT(t.ms_stime, '%H:%i') as ms_stime, TIME_FORMAT(t.ms_etime, '%H:%i') as ms_etime, t.ms_combine, t.mv_name, ti.th_kind, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM screen_seat WHERE ms_idx = t.ms_idx AND ss_res = 'A' ) AS countseat FROM timetableview t JOIN theater_info ti ON ti.th_combine = t.ms_combine WHERE ti.th_city = #{selCity} AND t.mv_name = #{selFilm}

SELECT DISTINCT ti.th_seatcnt, t.mv_idx, t.ms_idx, TIME_FORMAT(t.ms_stime, '%H:%i') as ms_stime, TIME_FORMAT(t.ms_etime, '%H:%i') as ms_etime, t.ms_combine, t.mv_name, ti.th_area, ti.th_kind, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM screen_seat WHERE ms_idx = t.ms_idx AND ss_res = 'A' ) AS countseat FROM timetableview t JOIN theater_info ti ON ti.th_combine = t.ms_combine WHERE ti.th_city = #{selCity} AND t.mv_name = #{selFilm} AND ti.th_kind = #{selKind}
